name: Best Com. Chillers, Ice (EE+DF)
energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost of ice storage is median of 400/600-ton capacity 'Connected Site-Built' 2020$ values for ice storage divided by 12 kBtu/h cooling per ton. This cost is added to the best available chiller cost to yield a total installed cost for the measure; assumes no additional cost for load shifting capabilities.

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetimes for high efficiency chillers in 2023

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2018 - Table E1 -  Major fuels consumption by end use, 2018
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Ventilation fraction is portion of ventilation consumption in commercial buildings where building cooling is served by a central chiller (230 TBtus / 728 TBtus).

_description: Adjust heating/cooling set point down/up to shed peak period electricity use, pair with ice storage (lg. commercial), in parallel with installing efficient HVAC equipment generally corresponding to the AEDG 50% guideline
